title: Voyager Continues to Grow API Partners
text:
Tiger Trading connects to Voyager to expand Crypto Offering

VANCOUVER, British Columbia — Voyager Digital (Canada) Ltd (“Voyager” of the “Company”) through its US regulated wholly owned crypto asset broker Voyager Digital, LLC and Tiger Trading Network, LLC (“Tiger Trading”), a NY based digital asset aggregator and order execution management system (OEMS), are pleased to announce that they now are now connected and offering an exciting new service.

“Voyager has a unique offering with several services that fit in nicely with Tiger’s vision to bring traders institutional grade technology and access to the world’s most critical exchanges,” said Stephen Ehrlich, CEO of Voyager. “The ability for Voyager to partner with a software platform like Tiger Trading allows us to expand our customer offering to reach an additional segment of the market.”

“We are excited to have connected into Voyager. They exemplify the quality, trust and integrity required to trade digital assets. Tiger Trading is now live, and this is a great step in our continuing growth,” said Glenn Rosenberg, CEO of Tiger Trading. “We are confident that this addition will immediately impact our ability to deliver a world class system.”

About Voyager Digital (Canada) Ltd.

Voyager Digital (Canada) Ltd. is a crypto-asset broker that provides retail and institutional investors with a turnkey solution to trade crypto assets. Voyager offers customers best execution and safe custody on a wide choice of popular crypto-assets. Voyager was founded by established Wall Street and Silicon Valley entrepreneurs who teamed to bring a better, more transparent and cost-efficient alternative for trading crypto-assets to the marketplace. Please visit us at https://www.investvoyager.com for more information and to review the latest Corporate Presentation.

About Tiger Trading Network, LLC

Tiger Trading Network, LLC is a New York based technology company offering next generation digital trading solutions. They provide equal and fast access across the global digital marketplace that allows traders to manage and trade all their accounts from a single platform. Tiger’s mission is to provide all traders with the very best institutional grade technology at an affordable price and are committed to solving the pain points that severely impact their clients. The system features low latency and high throughput using state of the art multicast technology.

Tiger Trading is live serving retail traders and sign up can be done via the website. All trading systems are free for the first 30 days and basic services are always free. https://www.tigertrading.com
